description: Number of permutations of n elements containing a 3-cycle.
comments: a(n)/n! is asymptotic to 1-e^(-1/3) = 1 - A092615. - _Michel Marcus_, Aug 08 2013
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: n! * { 1 - sum[ k=0..floor(n/3) ] (-1)^k / (3^k * k!) }.E.g.f.: 1/(1-x) - exp(-x^3/3)/(1-x). - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Jan 23 2013Recurrence: a(n) = n*a(n-1) - (n-2)*(n-1)*a(n-3) + (n-3)*(n-2)*(n-1)*a(n-4). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 13 2013
author: Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org)
